attributes.action: stop the FA Premier League increasing the number of games by one, and playing the additional one abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is created in the hope that the Prime MInister will be able to halt the Premier League's plans to play one (extra) game abroad.  This would reduce the fairness and integrity of the league, and has no benefits for the fans of the clubs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
